70010000086462.description:
Step into the world of high-end fashion retail with Fashion Store Simulator! Start small and grow your boutique into a must-visit shopping destination. Design a stylish store, stock the latest trends, and keep customers coming back for more.

Key Features:
- Build & Customize: Upgrade your store with chic decor, fitting rooms, and eye-catching displays.
- Curate the Trends: Sell everything from designer dresses to stylish accessories.
- Smart Management: Set prices, run promotions, and maximize profits.
- Customer Satisfaction: Keep shoppers happy to grow your reputation.
- Marketing & Events: Host fashion shows, sales, and VIP launches.

The fashion world is yours to conquer! Will your boutique become the hottest spot in town, or will you be drowning in unsold sequin jackets? Grab your clipboard, trust your instincts, and create a shopping experience that turns heads!
70010000086462.name: Fashion Store Simulator

70070000026767.description:
Enter the battlefield in "Tank vs Tank", an explosive clash of steel titans. 

This isn't just a game; it's war. Life and death hang in the balance, demanding your full attention. Every decision, from the drive to the deadly aim, could mean the difference between victory and defeat. Outwit, outshout, and outlast your opponents to ensure it's them, not you, who bite the dust.

Your choices are crucial - every move, every shot counts towards victory or defeat.

Enhance your tank with cutting-edge upgrades and face off against cunning opponents.

Use the vast arsenal at your disposal, make each shot your path to glory.

Ready your cannon, refine your tactics, and enter the battle. 

Victory awaits the bold – are you prepared to claim it?


This bundle includes base game, War Paint and War Paint #2 with:

-8 unique tank skins and 8 country flags, allowing you to customize your armored vehicles.
70070000026767.intro: Battle of the Tanks: Aim, Ready.... Fire!
70070000026767.name: Tank vs Tank Deluxe Edition

70010000065084.description:
Ninja Five-O entrenches you into the epic and ruthless voyage of Joe Osugi, who is a detective and players become the Ninja Five-O. Utilize a wide variety of masterful ninja skills to uphold justice by solving treacherous crimes such as bank heists and hijackings. Use unique ninjutsu moves to protect the city of Zipangu and take down the evil Mad Mask bosses. The key features of the game will be:
    >Ninjutsu, varity of attack modes
    >Time Trial mode, already cleared stage can be replayed in this timed mode. Each state will have a time target, where the objective is try to clear the stage before the alloted time is up. 
   >Save game (progression) at any time
   >Rewind feature
70010000065084.intro: Ninja Five-O  ultimate protector of the city
70010000065084.name: Ninja Five-O

70010000090427.description:
Jumper Jon is a 30-second metroidvania-style platforming adventure!

Jon is a tiny devil who lives in Limbo. One day, something fell from above and caused a big impact. Jon decided to explore and found it was a girl named Jane.

Together, they will discover the source of the imbalance between good and evil on Earth and fight against it.

Explore Hell in 30-second chunks! It does not matter if you run out of time or die, you will get back and keep the items you get!

Game features
- Metroidvania adventure with a unique gameplay concept!
- Discover a great and intriguing story!
- Find special items and abilities and explore the Hell!
- Rescue Souls to get collectible trophies!
- Simple and intuitive game controls!
- Beauty cartoon-styled graphics!
- Awesome original soundtrack!

Ogre Pixel
2025
70010000090427.name: Jumper Jon

70010000091381.description:
Taiji is an adventure puzzle-solving game set in a mysterious world full of puzzles. Unlike many adventure games, the puzzles in Taiji all use a consistent interface: a grid of tiles which can be toggled on or off.
Although this might seem simple, the consistency of the interface frees the player from guesswork or pixel hunting that happens in many adventure games. It is always clear what the player must interact with in order to solve the puzzle, but it is never entirely clear what they must do. There are many different areas in the game, each with their own visual and mechanical themes. As you explore this dense world, it is important to think hard and to pay close attention, as vital clues are sometimes hidden in plain sight.
70010000091381.intro: Solve puzzle panels and uncover the meaning of the symbols within. Explore a dense world where secrets are hidden in plain sight.
70010000091381.name: Taiji

70010000079810.description:
I See Red is a twin-stick shooter that will put you in the shoes of Matthew Taurus, who is looking to get revenge on his tormentors. In fact, he is so focused on his quest that he stops paying attention to anything else… except his targets, constantly glowing RED.

Conquer enemy ships and embrace destruction

Fight your way through the entire galaxy, invading spaceships manned by Humans, Robots or Aliens, each with their own weaponry, augments and more. Everything you can interact with, you can destroy. Every cover and detail can explode into a thousand pieces. Use this to your advantage and expose your enemies. You can also brutally execute your foes with your own, bare hands.

Failure is just a stepping stone

Every time you begin a new playthrough, you will be able to complete challenges to experience new unexplored paths, more powerful skills, fearless enemies you’ve never seen before, the most incredible abilities and more. Make your runs more diverse every time you start anew and find innovative ways of completing your quest for vengeance!

A story of vengeance, violence, and pain

You’re an outlaw traveling through space, infinite and black, in search of the person who subjected you to such unspeakable pain. Corrupted on the inside, you’re hell-bent on finding out what they did to make you this way.

As you travel through the galaxy you will eventually find pieces of your broken mind - is it too late to remember your past?

Key Features:
- Fast-paced fights in a very destructive environment
- Fill out your rage meter and enter RAGE for extra damage dealt to your opponents...
- ... from three different factions - humans, robots and aliens, each with unique fighting styles
- A variety of ranged and melee weapons - from human pistols to robotic lasers
- Numerous passive skills that make every playthrough unique
- Growing stronger after each death via post-run upgrades
- Unique grappling hook finishers that are as stylish as they are brutal
70010000079810.intro: Vengeance is within arm’s reach - take it
70010000079810.name: I See Red

70010000083493.description:
Collect berries, find secrets with bonuses, throw objects at enemies or jump on them to win. Find secret stars and change costumes. Defeat the bosses and get to the last one to save the little rabbits from captivity. Explore green fields, caves, rivers, snowy mountains, icy lakes, deserts and ruins.

Features:
- 12 different levels
- 8 kinds of enemies
- 10 costumes (not counting the standard)
- Tons of secrets
- Running, jumping, swimming, skating
70010000083493.intro: Save your family by going on an adventure as a cute bunny.
70010000083493.name: Rabbit Raid

70010000085223.description:
In this new anthology release of Crime Opera, explore a variety of short stories that take place before, during and after the events of the original visual novel, all presented in beautifully crafted hand-drawn style to convey the drama, emotion and gritty truth surrounding characters’ lives in the criminal underworld.

“A Day in the Strife” spotlights the daily life of Terry Childers, a side character from The Butterfly Effect. In the “Recollections” chapter, Molly and Alice get together to reminisce about the past, revisiting critical moments from both their histories. Finally, “Aftermath” serves as an epilogue exploring the immediate fallout of The Butterfly Effect and the impact it has on many intertwined lives.

• Navigate multiple side stories within the Crime Opera chronology!
• Discover the many ways lives are intertwined in the criminal underworld.
• Gain new insight into the personalities and circumstances of key characters!
• Unlock scenes and view them anytime in gallery mode.
• Enjoy vibrant and detailed visuals presented in hand-drawn style!
70010000085223.intro: Experience a special chapter in the ongoing mafia tale surrounding the infamous Gallos family!
70010000085223.name: Crime Opera Fandisk: The Caterpillar Candids

70010000085227.description:
Experience a new chapter in the mafia tale surrounding the Gallos family! This story begins 9 years after the original. Xander Gallo is now bitter, alone and out of control. He’s causing problems for not only other families within the syndicate but also for younger Gallo members as well. Those who remained behind to continue the family legacy are soon forced to take sides with or against Xander Gallo, while others who have seemingly moved on with their lives are pulled back in against their will.

This is a tale of loyalty and deceit, murder and survival, as well as the strength or frailty of familial bonds. As a visual novel, Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect allows players the option of witnessing events in linear “kinetic” fashion or to affect how the narrative progresses by making key decisions along the way, all depicted with meticulously hand-drawn character portraits, a wide variety of scenes and scenarios to explore, original backgrounds and a soundtrack to fit the brooding and dangerous atmosphere.

• Explore a complex tale of life in the mafia!
• Choose from multiple narrative styles, either linear or dynamic where you make key decisions.
• Meet a colorful cast of characters with their own secrets and motivations!
• Follow the story of the Gallos family from multiple characters’ perspectives.
• Enjoy vibrant and detailed visuals presented in hand-drawn style!
70010000085227.intro: Experience a new chapter in the dark tale of mafia life, death and the bloody bonds of family!
70010000085227.name: Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect

70010000091172.description:
The Bodycam Shooter throws you into relentless, first-person combat where every second counts. As an elite operative, you’ll fight through intense, fast-paced battles across diverse environments, from war-torn streets to hidden enemy bases.

Earn coins in the heat of battle and upgrade your arsenal with a vast selection of powerful weapons. Adapt your tactics, master every firefight, and outgun your opponents to dominate each mission.

With immersive bodycam-style visuals and high-stakes action, The Bodycam Shooter delivers an adrenaline-fueled experience where survival is the only option. Lock, load, and step into the fight!
70010000091172.intro: Fast, tactical, and relentless—survive the fight.
70010000091172.name: The Bodycam Shooter

70050000054377.description:
Expansion Pack No.9
Includes songs by the five members of V.W.P!
Hum along to some brand-new melodies!
 
 [Included Songs]
 "reincarnation" (V.W.P)
 "The Metamorphosis" (V.W.P)
 "Resonance" (V.W.P)
 "Secret" (V.W.P)
 "DESTINY"(V.W.P)
70050000054377.name: Extension Pack No.9 feat. V.W.P

70050000054380.description:
A special expansion pack!
Includes songs by ASU!
Hum along to some brand-new melodies!

 [Included Songs]
 "Fake" (ASU)
 "Lightyears" (ASU)
 "Imperfect" (ASU)
 "Under bouquet" (ASU)
 "Slowly"(ASU)
70050000054380.name: Extra Pack feat. ASU

70070000026795.description:
Crime Opera: The Butterfly Effect

Following the sudden death of a mafia family’s matriarch, her sons Gerald and Xander are put on the defensive as former partners threaten to take over their collective business ventures for themselves. See through the eyes of the Gallo children as they witness murders, kidnappings and other crimes wrought upon their households by their own fathers.

Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect

Experience a new chapter in the mafia tale surrounding the Gallos family! This story begins 9 years after the original. Xander Gallo is now bitter, alone and out of control. He’s causing problems for not only other families within the syndicate but also for younger Gallo members as well. Those who remained behind to continue the family legacy are soon forced to take sides with or against Xander Gallo, while others who have seemingly moved on with their lives are pulled back in against their will.

Crime Opera Fandisk: The Caterpillar Candids

In this new anthology release of Crime Opera, explore a variety of short stories that take place before, during and after the events of the original visual novel, all presented in beautifully crafted hand-drawn style to convey the drama, emotion and gritty truth surrounding characters’ lives in the criminal underworld.
70070000026795.intro: Explore an anthology of tales about mafia life!
70070000026795.name: Crime Opera Collection

70010000016651.description:
- Play as adorable dinosaurs across 60 pre-designed gamemodes.
- 60 modes not enough for you? Mix it up by choosing from and combining 50 gameplay mutators.
- Still not enough variety?! Build your own gamemodes from 100s of further options that can be combined together however you like.
- Customise your dinosaur! Want to be royalty? A pirate? Wear a cone-of-shame? Be the dinosaur you always wanted to be!

Party Poppers follows in the footsteps of Party Golf and Party Crashers with the same incredible customisation options and crazy competitive couch gameplay you know and love. There's a game mode for everyone!
- Capture the Flag
- King of the Hill / Domination
- Race mode
- The Floor is Lava
- Boopmatch
- Tag
70010000016651.intro: Run, jump, grapple, and pop your way to emerge victorious amongst your friends!
70010000016651.name: Party Poppers

70010000058112.description:
The cult classic from the '90s returns! Glover is a charming 3D platformer where you control a magical glove on a quest to restore balance to the kingdom. 

Roll, jump, and manipulate your magic ball to solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and defeat the evil glove threatening the world!

● Control Glover and his magical ball through six vibrant worlds filled with secrets, creative platforming, and curious enemies.
● Switch between different ball forms to overcome obstacles and solve clever puzzles.
● Discover amazing power-ups that enhance Glover’s abilities and expand your gameplay possibilities.
● Face off against the evil glove, who will stop at nothing to ensure chaos reigns forever!
70010000058112.intro: The classic 3D platforming adventure is back—better than ever! Roll, jump, and shape your journey in this hands-down ball-tastic adventure!
70010000058112.name: Glover (QUByte Classics)

70010000077430.description:
GET READY TO UNLEASH CHAOS IN THE ZEBRA-MAN!

Strike, destroy and immerse yourself in a vengeful bloodbath! Inspired by classic Grindhouse films, The Zebra-Man! takes top-down pixel art gaming to a whole new level. Face impossible situations, unravel temporal paradoxes and annihilate all enemies in your path with limitless brutality. Delve into merciless carnage and unleash chaos without mercy!

With an unmistakable visual style, a groundbreaking soundtrack and your savage need for blood, you will explode through a succession of surreal events that will test your ingenuity and your tenacity through puzzles and fist fights with violence everywhere. 

REVENGE WEARS STRIPES! 

It's the 70s and a group of crazy scientists have been conducting atrocious experiments on you deep in a secret facility. When an unexpected ally in a raccoon mask rescues you in exchange for revenge, shedding your humanity and embracing your animal side might be your only way out. 

Who is Alexander Cooper and why does the mysterious Raccoon man want you to kill him? What secrets are contained in this secret facility and what atrocities will you have to do to escape? Get ready for time travel, interdimensional portals and enemies who want to see you torn into a million bloody pieces. 

FEATURES

Retro gaming homage - An intriguing story  tribute to classic top-down pixel art action games and Grindhouse movies with an Intriguing story, time travel 

A crazy cast of playable characters - Good guys, bad guys, scientists and security guards, there are many characters to control, each with their own utilities and quests. 

Live-Action Scenes - The first rule of live-action scenes is you do not talk about live-action scenes! 

Puzzle me this? - It’s not all rampage and gore, sometimes you will need to stop and take a look around for clues and solve the puzzles.  

Karma sucks! - Actions have consequences, right? The game’s Karma System will make sure you get what’s coming to you. 

Check out the ADS - The Zebra-Man’s (optional) Adaptive Difficulty System means you will never get stuck in a level. The more times you die, the easier the difficulty becomes. Enemies get slower, guns have less ammo and more helpful items will spawn. 

Groundbreaking soundtrack - A vibrant soundtrack to get you in the Grindhouse film mood featuring tracks from Zay Bass, Doom in Hell, Da Flex and many more. 

And, YES! You can pet the dog.
70010000077430.intro: Revenge wears stripes! The Zebra-Man! is a hyper-charged pixel art top-down action game with brutal fist fights and blood spilling in your wake.
70010000077430.name: The Zebra-Man!

70010000082988.description:
Vertical Kingdom is set in a world devastated by a war that lasted for an entire generation. The once great Empire is in shambles and it's up to the Great Architect to rebuild toward its former glory brick by brick. Travel the land, embark on randomized, roguelite-style expeditions, and build new cities with a fresh card-based building system combined with an intricate resource economy.

Rebuild an Empire, not through force of arms or devious politics, but brick and mortar!

Raise towering cities using a card-based system. Pick five decks each turn, then play the cards to build upwards. Manage resources like food, water, bricks, wood, stone, and metal, all needed to ensure the city has room to grow and play new cards.

As the Great Architect, it's your job to rebuild the Empire, one building and one region at a time. Undertake great expeditions to raise new cities in the Emperor's name and deal with the challenges of each region: Treacherous terrain, resource shortages, and ever-limited building space.

Take ownership of every decision and every card played as all buildings are permanent, no redos. Plan around and synergize with imperial citizen’s homes and workshops. Produce more taxes, resources, and maintain loyalty to the Empire - and just maybe the locals will help you with the great evil that lurks among the ruins...
70010000082988.intro: Revive a lost empire in this card-based city builder with a twist - you can only construct your buildings upwards!
70010000082988.name: Vertical Kingdom

70010000084445.description:
Embark on a journey of anomalies and repetition in "Prison Loop," a captivating puzzle game. Trapped in a mysterious temporal loop within a high-security prison, your objective is to observe anomalies throughout the environment and react if something alerts you.

Test your observation skills, critical thinking, and ability to manipulate time to your advantage. Explore a meticulously designed prison filled with hidden secrets, atmospheric details, and haunting visuals. Try to survive in this place full of anomalies.

Untangle the mysteries of "Prison Loop" and escape the endless cycle. Will you break the cycle, or will you stay trapped forever?
70010000084445.intro: Untangle the mysteries of "Prison Loop" and escape the endless cycle.
70010000084445.name: Prison Loop

70010000084532.description:
Duel alongside old friends as the iconic stars of the original Yu-Gi-Oh! anime return in this expansive collection of classic Yu-Gi-Oh! titles. 

Including a plethora of Yu-Gi-Oh! games never-before-released outside of Japan!

♦ DUEL ONLINE
Challenge Duelists from around the world with online play in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 4: Battle of Great Duelists! Select titles will also be updated to support online play after release.

♦ CUSTOMIZE YOUR PLAY
Unlock hidden characters and cards, the option to remove Deck Capacity, Duelist Level, and cards from the Forbidden & Limited List, customize your button mapping, and much more.

♦ REWIND TIME
Turn back the clock with the Rewind function or fast forward to watch your strategy unfold at mach speeds.

♦ SAVE ANYWHERE
Pick up and Duel right where you left off with the option to save at any time.

♦ DIGITAL GALLERY
Explore preserved box art and manuals from each title in the Digital Gallery.

<Title Lineup> 
1. Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters
2. Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters II: Dark Duel Stories
3. Yu-Gi-Oh! Monster Capsule
4. Yu-Gi-Oh! Dark Duel Stories
5. Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 4: Battle of Great Duelists
6. Yu-Gi-Oh! Dungeon Dice Monsters
7. Yu-Gi-Oh! The Eternal Duelist Soul
8. Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 6: Expert 2*
9. Yu-Gi-Oh! The Sacred Cards
10. Yu-Gi-Oh! Reshef of Destruction
11. Yu-Gi-Oh! Worldwide Edition: Stairway to the Destined Duel
12. Yu-Gi-Oh! World Championship Tournament 2004
13. Yu-Gi-Oh! Destiny Board Traveler
14. Yu-Gi-Oh! 7 Trials to Glory: World Championship Tournament 2005 (Yu-Gi-Oh! Day of the Duelist: World Championship Tournament 2005)

*Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 6: Expert 2 to be released in Japanese language. You can enjoy the Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 6: Expert 2 experience in other languages via playing Yu-Gi-Oh! Worldwide Edition: Stairway to the Destined Duel. 

<About Yu-Gi-Oh!> 
Yu-Gi-Oh! is a true global phenomenon and fan favorite. For over 25 years the Yu-Gi-Oh! Card Game has amassed a fervent following and continues to flourish with each new series and expansion. To date, fans have engaged by reading the original Manga as well as watching more than 1,000 Yu-Gi-Oh! anime episodes across eight series and playing the Yu-Gi-Oh! TRADING CARD GAME and Yu-Gi-Oh! digital titles.
70010000084532.intro: Everlasting masterpieces from the history of Yu-Gi-Oh! digital games are back!
70010000084532.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! EARLY DAYS COLLECTION

70010000087266.description:
Step into a world of romance and flowers in this refreshingly mature Otome that charts the lives of four couples, centered around a local flower shop. 

‘Him, the Smile and bloom’ is a unique exploration of the flourishing relationship between two adults and the highs and lows of their budding romance in a modern world.

From the initial spark of attraction to the struggles of maintaining a relationship and navigating life’s choppy waters - Him the Smile and bloom, deftly weaves heartwarming - and heart-breaking! - narrative threads for a genuinely distinct and memorable Otome experience!


Say it with flowers!: Him, the Smile and Bloom charts four whirlwind romances - from the tender love of youth, to thorny, tumultuous and steamy. There are four distinct love matches to explore.

Couple up! Rather than one protagonist with a selection of love interests, Him the Smile and Bloom instead focuses on the relationship between four couples and love interests - Wataru, Ginnosuke, Hokuto, and Tenya.

Twelve distinct endings: Each couple has three endings to explore. However! Rather than traditional ‘good’ or ‘bad’ endings, each of the couple’s potential futures are poignant and offer something worthwhile to enjoy, regardless of the romantic (or not!) outcome.

A refreshingly adult approach to Otome romance: By focusing on the growing relationship between four couples. Him, the Smile and bloom brings a unique maturity to the exploration of love and the lives of these couples.

Gorgeous production values: Wonderful character artwork and vibrant and detailed game world, combine with expressive voice work to really enhance the tenderness and emotion of each story.

Revised and improved localisation. Additional localisation edits and revisions to bring greater accuracy and quality to the western release of Him, the Smile and bloom.

Additional side stories: Completing the ‘Glow’ or ‘best’ ending to each couples’ story unlocks additional side stories to enjoy - bringing further life to these unforgettable characters.
70010000087266.name: Him, the Smile & bloom

70010000088320.description:
Black night, an abandoned mansion and a bunch of monsters. Sounds like the perfect job. Players will have to use a a variety of weapons to save their skin and master the challenge of leading survivors to safety, while also defending the building from invaders. They can use more than 60 weapons, from vases and floor lamps to chainsaws, shotguns and ginormous hammers. If the monsters thrash too many rooms or the player's health bar runs out, only an entry in the highscore list will remain of you.
Fast-paced, challenging action, hunting for the top spot in the highscore list, and an 80s horror movie setting - tons of fun and bizarre humor!
Carefully designed abandoned mansion looked so inviting for explorers.
Old School feel: The way it used to be, but better.
Not just decoration: Your Achievements become actual in-game bonuses.
Endless horror: A total of 11 types of monsters are waiting to be defeated with more than 60 unique weapons or your bare hands.
70010000088320.intro: Endless Horror in a world of Nostalgia!!
70010000088320.name: My Night Job

70010000090969.description:
Try this incredible mix of track and field and running. Pole vaulting through the course is something very unusual and unrealistically fun! 

It is very important to choose the right direction and the right moment for the next jump. The higher the obstacle you choose, the harder the game, but also the higher the reward. 

You can defeat your opponents using different tactics. Which ones? You'll have to find out as you play. 

Complete all the levels and collect all the prizes. You can even unlock fun skins for your athletes. Have fun with this new sport!      

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Watch out for your new favorite sport!
70010000090969.intro: Try your hand at fantastic pole vaulting. It's not easy at all!
70010000090969.name: Vaulting Champions

70010000091125.description:
Embark on a quest to become the greatest artist in the world.
The battlefield is your canvas, the enemies are your paint. Literally. The art you make is yours to keep.

Choose from a variety of brushes and characters. From a slow and steady thick brush to a quick and nimble paint roller - we've got you covered.

Finishing a painting rewards you with versatile items. Enlist the help of a friendly painting bucket, install some paint turrets, give your enemies moustache or become a robot. Find a way to express your true self!

After the paint has settled and the brushes are cleaned, take a step back and admire your masterpieces in the gallery.
70010000091125.intro: An action-packed roguelite shooter where you battle famous works of art and each level you beat becomes a painting!
70010000091125.name: Antipaint

70010000091309.description:
■GAME SYSTEM
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and story goes on.

■STORY
During a journey...
You hear of a mansion that stands on a hill.

It says nobody has made their way out of it 
once stepping in.

On a step forward to the mansion,
A door behind me closes slowly on its own.

Seems you're trapped in the mansion…
Can you make your way outー
70010000091309.intro:
The orthodox escape game for you, staged in a rumored mansion.
Can you solve all the riddles and get out?
70010000091309.name: Escape Game The Painting Mansion

70010000091669.description:
Knock down coins one after another and obtain the pirate's treasure.
Head for the treasure islands and defeat the enemies that stand in your way!
All the riches shall be yours!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 family members or friends can join in!

[Score Attack]
Compete to earn as many coins as possible within the time limit and aim for a high spot on the leaderboards!
Play solo or multiplayer!

[Endless]
Play for as long as you like without a time limit!
The coins you've earned will persist between tries!

[Ranking]
Earn a rank for both Score Attack and Endless modes!
Compete against players worldwide!

[Online]
Score Attack is also available in Online Mode!
Work together, and the treasure will be yours!

Play together with up to 4 players!
Alone or together, aim for your next high score!
70010000091669.intro:
Toss coins and rule the high seas!
Golden riches slumber on the treasure islands that await you!
70010000091669.name: Blackbeard's Treasure

70010000092389.description:
Welcome to a terrifying survival horror game where the mundane turns into a nightmare. You find yourself trapped in an endless, eerie supermarket—fluorescent lights flicker, aisles stretch into the void, and something lurks in the shadows.

Explore the abandoned store, solve cryptic puzzles, and search for an escape while evading unseen horrors that stalk your every move. The deeper you go, the more reality distorts, turning familiar shelves into a twisted maze of paranoia and dread.

With immersive sound design, dynamic AI-driven threats, and a chilling atmosphere, every step could be your last. Will you find the exit, or become just another lost soul in the supermarket's endless depths?
70010000092389.intro: Trapped, Lost, Hunted. Can You Escape?
70010000092389.name: Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket Horror

70010000092867.description:
In the quiet of your workshop, process various rough stones to create gems with the ultimate sparkle.

1. Selecting Raw Stones
When you start the game, you will be presented with the color and shape of the gemstone you should create. Select an appropriate raw stone from the list provided and begin processing.

2. Gemstone Processing
Rotate the 3D model of the raw stone and carefully lower it onto the lathe. By repeating this process, you will carve the raw stone and shape the gemstone. Once it matches the shape of the gemstone you are supposed to make, press the finish button and check the results of your work!

3. Confirming the Results
Your gem crafting results will be evaluated! The more accurately you work, the better the rewards you will receive. The gems you create can be named and added to your collection!
70010000092867.intro: "LAPIDARY: Jewel Craft Simulator" is a simple and minimalistic gem crafting simulator.
70010000092867.name: LAPIDARY: Jewel Craft Simulator

70010000093878.description:
Enjoy adorable cat photos while challenging your brain in this fun and easy quiz game!

Simple and Fun to Play
・Read the question and carefully check the images.
・When you find the correct cat, tap it before time runs out!

Learn the names of rare and unique cats from around the world—just by playing!

Not sure of the answer? No worries! Tap the Hint button to get a clue about where to look.

Perfect for cat lovers, quiz fans, and anyone looking for a fun way to learn while relaxing!

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000093878.intro:
Which One Is the Ragdoll?
A Relaxing & Brain-Training Game That’s Fun and Educational!
70010000093878.name: Cat Spotting Challenge!

70050000050034.description: Spring into action with Monster Jam™ Showdown - Always On Duty.  This DLC features 3 hard working trucks.
70050000050034.name: Monster Jam™ Showdown - Always On Duty

70050000052851.description:
The employees at Fill Flower are preparing for an exciting Halloween! From store decorations, to new costumes, to special giveaway items for the customers - Fill Flower is looking forward to a Halloween which brings people together.
 Hear the boys speak about those they love, and see them all dressed up in this short but sweet side story that takes place after the events of the main game!
70050000052851.name: Him, the Smile & bloom - Additional scenario - Flower Halloween Night

70050000053613.description:
This stunning collection of three authentic Williams™ tables includes WHITE WATER™, RED AND TED'S ROAD SHOW™, and HURRICANE™. All available to play both in their classic original form and as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

- WHITE WATER: Ride the Spine Chiller down Insanity Falls, returning via the Boomerang Bend and passing through Big Foot's Cave. Just go with the flow!
- RED AND TED'S ROAD SHOW: Wreck roads across the U.S., from sea to shining sea. Make it to the California and visit up to 18 great American cities!
- HURRICANE: With all the thrills and chills of an amusement park, this table dazzles the crowd from pie-in-the-face antics and scoring hoopla to the revolving backglass wheel!
70050000053613.name: Pinball FX - Williams Pinball Volume 4

70050000053614.description:
This stunning collection of three authentic Williams™ and Bally™ tables includes TALES OF THE ARABIAN NIGHTS™, CIRQUS VOLTAIRE™, and NO GOOD GOFERS™. All available to play both in their classic original form and as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

- TALES OF THE ARABIAN NIGHTS: Your wish is granted. Ride the magic carpet, bash the evil genie, rub Aladdin's wonderful lamp, and rescue the princess! 
- CIRQUS VOLTAIRE: Battle the crazed ringmaster, hit the oversized Menagerie ball, fire the cannon, and pump up the high-voltage BOOM balloon. Electrifying excitement!
- NO GOOD GOFERS: Hit a hole-in-one with the innovative Slam Ramp™, get a Spinning Whirlwheel™ award, play golf, and battle Buzz and Bud, the cheeky gofers. You'll really go'fer this one!
70050000053614.name: Pinball FX - Williams Pinball Volume 5

70050000053615.description:
This stunning collection of three authentic Williams™ and Bally™ tables includes FUNHOUSE™, SPACE STATION™, and DR. DUDE AND HIS EXCELLENT RAY™. All available to play both in their classic original form and as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

- FUNHOUSE: Starring Rudy, pinball's most iconic ventriloquist dummy antagonist! Don't let his relentless taunting get to you.
- SPACE STATION: Prepare for liftoff. We have ignition. It's time to launch this classic.
- DR. DUDE AND HIS EXCELLENT RAY™: Drop in to Dr. Dude's Kinetic Clinic! Get hip! Earn respect! Be the envy of your friends! Advance the DUDE-O-METER from Plain Dude to Super Dude for the ultimate dude-o-riffic reward. Way cool pinball has finally arrived!
70050000053615.name: Pinball FX - Williams Pinball Volume 6

70050000054524.description: Unlocks “Bonus Story: Heroes of the Past”! Clear the story to add Scarlet and Sprout from Phantom Brave to your party!
70050000054524.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Bonus Story: Heroes of the Past

70050000055444.description: Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket Recordings Simulator DLC expands the mystery with new radio dialogues and eerie recordings scattered throughout the abandoned aisles. Tune in to cryptic broadcasts, distress calls, and chilling survivor messages that reveal hidden secrets of the supermarket. Each transmission deepens the lore, blurring the line between reality and nightmare. Listen carefully—some voices may guide you, while others may lead you astray. Will you piece together the truth, or will the whispers consume you?
70050000055444.intro: Uncover the Truth, One Tape at a Time.
70050000055444.name: Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket Recordings Simulator

70050000055445.description: Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket Creepy Music DLC enhances the horror with an unsettling soundtrack that deepens the fear. Experience eerie ambient noises, distorted supermarket jingles, and spine-chilling soundscapes that make every moment more intense. The unsettling melodies react to your movements, amplifying the tension as you navigate the endless aisles. Immerse yourself in a nightmare where even the music feels alive—will you escape, or will the sound of fear consume you?
70050000055445.intro: Haunting Sounds, Deeper Dread, Ultimate Terror.
70050000055445.name: Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket Creepy Music

70070000025848.description:
Refreshing otome that explores the relationships of four different couples, all connected by a local flower shop.
 From unrequited love to unexpected new encounters, follow the stories of these adults all with different personalities, as they fall in love and blossom in their relationships.
 This bundle includes the main game and the additional side story - “Flower Halloween Night”.
70070000025848.name: Him, the Smile & bloom Bundle

70070000026800.description:
Deluxe Edition delivers the ultimate horror experience, packed with all the spine-chilling DLCs to push your fear to the edge. Dive deeper into the heart of the supermarket’s endless, distorted aisles where every corner hides a new terror.

The Creepy Music DLC amplifies the nightmare with haunting melodies that wrap around you, turning each moment into an atmosphere of pure dread. Meanwhile, the Recordings Simulator DLC lets you uncover cryptic radio dialogues and hidden messages, shedding light on the twisted secrets that lie beneath the surface.

This is no ordinary survival horror—this is the full, unrelenting terror of a world gone mad. Escape if you can, but remember, every step forward is one closer to the abyss. Are you ready to face the nightmare in its most complete form?
70070000026800.intro: The Ultimate Survival Package: Main Game + All DLCs for the Full Nightmare Experience!
70070000026800.name: Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket Horror Deluxe Edition

70010000084593.description:
OVERTOP is an exhilarating game about a little owlet who has fallen from its cozy nest and is determined to return to the peak of the mountain. This game combines charming cartoon graphics with hardcore gameplay that promises countless unforgettable moments!
You’ll need to climb to the very top, overcoming steep cliffs and deep chasms. But be careful—this won’t be an easy task! With each jump, the stakes get higher, and a fall can send you further away from your cherished goal.
Remember the main rule of the feathered club: "The higher you climb, the more painful the fall!" Join us on this adventure, hone your skills, and show what you’re made of!
Are you ready to take on the challenge and bring the owlet home? Then let's soar to new heights!
70010000084593.name: Overtop

70010000087412.description:
From the pen of former Nintendo art director turned manga artist, Takaya Imamura, and developers of the Retro Mystery Club series, Happymeal, comes a 16-bit styled retro-future, adventure, infused with RPG elements: OMEGA 6: The Triangle Stars.
 
A Turbulent Quest for the Ultimate Treasure
Follow the adventures of Thunder and Kyla on their spaceship, Omega 6: two androids entrusted with discovering a new planet for the human race to inhabit. But before they find mankind's new home, they must locate the ultimate treasure in some ancient ruins to pay off... a planetary loan?! Their quest will take them to three different planets, the first planet is Impostar, a planet filled with aliens from all four corners of space. The second planet is Igni, a fiery planet with a harsh environment. The third planet is Froslara, a planet as frozen as its residents are rich.
And on every planet, new encounters and incidents await!
 
Over 100 aliens! An adventure combo-meal of mystery & drama!
During your treasure hunt, unexpected encounters await at every turn via random events. You can explore freely while working as a bounty hunter, delivery person, or just shopping for items: how to play is up to you. For the completionists, there's a gallery to record all the intergalactic rogues you meet, sub-missions, and training where you can battle powerful opponents! Contrary to its name, space is very full!

Battle rival treasure hunters and a plethora of aliens in card-based battles!
Treasure attracts trouble, leading to card-based battles with anyone from rival treasure hunters to unknown aliens lurking about. With a set number of cards in your hand, read through your opponent’s strategy and forge a path to absolute victory! Inside your spaceship is a bonsai that bears fruits. Use them to boost your abilities or switch your opponent’s hand with yours. This bonsai also bears Magic Fruits, which will hold tremendous powers, but use them at your own risk!

Story
Earth, somewhere in the distant future.
Thanks to a technology that extends the average lifespan up to about 400 years, humanity lives comfortably, despite the societal problems associated with an aging populace.

Then, one day, a wormhole appeared suddenly near Mars. Via this phenomenon, Earth saw an influx of aliens and, before anybody realized, all the planet’s major cities were occupied by these migratory extra-terrestrials.
Concerned with this situation, Dr Victor Franklin, a leading researcher on longevity, decides to search for a second Earth. In order to that humanity may thrive once again thrive once their new home was found, he creates two androids, Thunder and Kyla, and sends them in on their quest aboard the Omega 6 spacecraft.

And thus began Thunder and Kyla's long and extraordinary adventures.
Creators

Story & Art by Takaya Imamura
Takaya Imamura joined Nintendo in 1989 and worked on the art direction for series like Star Fox, F-Zero and The Legend of Zelda. He left Nintendo in 2021 to work as a lecturer at the International Professional University of Technology in Osaka. Being an illustrator, he also launched his first manga Omega 6 in France in October 2022, via Omaké Books.

Sound by Shinobu Amayake
Shinobu Amayake composed music for Nintendo games such as Stunt Race FX, NES Open Tournament Golf, Wario’s Woods and Pokémon Ranger: Shadows of Almia. After leaving Nintendo, she now works as a pianist and a jazz vocalist performing in Kyoto and Osaka.
70010000087412.intro: OMEGA 6 The Triangle Stars is an adventure game with 16-bit styling, based on the manga by former Nintendo art director, Takaya Imamura.
70010000087412.name: Omega 6 The Triangle Stars

70010000088270.description:
An unremarkable princess in an unremarkable castle has been kidnapped by a group of mysterious ninjas. Luckily for her, a young ninja named Casey is aware of the situation, and embarks on a mission to save her because... he is the Ninja of Justice!

Join Casey and learn the art of ninjutsu as he explores a land full of secrets and dangerous enemies! 


Features:
* Available in English for the first time!
* 2 game modes: choose between a Quest Mode that includes light RPG elements such as branching stages, a level-up system, equipment and secondary quests, or an Action Mode that focuses on classic brawler action
* Local co-op 2-player mode
* Rewind/Turbo function: repeat something until you achieve perfection, or speed things up
* Save state function: save wherever you want to in the game, and restart from that exact point
* Screen filters: select from several filters to modify how the game looks (retro-style monitor, black-and-white, etc.)
* Gallery: view images from the original game’s manual and box design
* Cheats function: activate cheats that will make your mission a lot easier (infinite lives, invulnerability, etc.)
* Jukebox: listen to the 30 music tracks included in the game whenever you want
70010000088270.intro: The 16-bit classic comes to the West for the very first time!
70010000088270.name: Justice Ninja Casey

70010000091092.description:
In “VoidCraft Island Chronicles: Sky Survival,” you find yourself as a nomadic explorer cast into the mysterious Void, a world with its own secrets and surprises. This enigmatic realm invites you to uncover its hidden mysteries and navigate its unique landscapes, each filled with challenges and unexpected encounters.

Construct and enhance your sailing vessel to better equip yourself for the journey ahead. Starting with a simple raft, you’ll develop it into a formidable vessel complete with a ship’s hold, mast, and captain’s cabin. Customize your vessel with various objects, from storages and workbenches to decorations, making it truly your own.
As you traverse the surreal terrains of the Void, you’ll confront numerous foes and navigate through ever-changing environments.

Features:
• Uncover Hidden Mysteries: Explore the enigmatic Void, a world filled with secrets and surprises, offering unique landscapes and unexpected encounters..
• Build and Customize Your Vessel: Start with a simple raft and transform it into a formidable sailing vessel, complete with ship’s hold, mast, and captain’s cabin. Personalize your ship with storages, workbenches, and decorations.
• Challenging Exploration: Navigate through surreal and ever-changing terrains, each filled with distinct challenges and adversaries to overcome.
• Engage in Combat: Confront numerous foes as you journey through the Void, testing your survival skills and strategic thinking.
• Dynamic Environment: Immerse yourself in a richly detailed world that evolves and changes, ensuring each journey is unique.
• Strategic Upgrades: Enhance your vessel and equipment to better prepare for the adventures and dangers that lie ahead.
• Immersive Storyline: Engage with a captivating narrative that unfolds as you progress, revealing the deep lore and history of the Void.
• Customizable Experience: Tailor your gameplay with a variety of objects and enhancements, making each playthrough a personalized adventure.

Uncover unexpected twists along the way, the Void promises an unparalleled adventure waiting to be experienced, testing your survival skills and resilience.
70010000091092.intro: Build, explore and survive on floating islands!
70010000091092.name: VoidCraft Island Chronicles: Sky Survival

70010000091442.description:
Engage in high-intensity combat, strategize with your squad, and outsmart your opponents in the ultimate test of tactical warfare.

In “Call of Warzone”, you’ll dive into fast-paced, team-based skirmishes where every decision counts. As part of a 5-person squad, your mission is to deplete the enemy’s score before they take yours down in a battle for dominance. With 1000 points on the line, the stakes are higher than ever.

Key Features:

– Team-Based Strategy: Command your team through intense combat, using smart tactics to outmaneuver the opposition.

– Score-Based Combat: Every kill impacts the score—eliminate the enemy and protect your team’s points to secure victory.

– Varied Combat Zones: Face off in five unique, dynamic environments, each offering different challenges and opportunities for strategy.

– Weapon Variety: Choose from over 20 different weapons, from rifles to explosives, and tailor your loadout to fit your playstyle.

Get ready to prove your worth in “Call of Warzone”, where skill, strategy, and teamwork determine who stands tall in the warzone. A thrilling solo-player experience that combines strategic action and immersive gameplay. 

Will you rise to the challenge and lead your squad to victory?
70010000091442.intro: Fight with strategy, dominate the battlefield, claim your victory
70010000091442.name: Call of Warzone

70010000092170.description:
Capture the Moment!

Embark on a thrilling journey with Kin’s dream job. You just got hired during your job interview.
Can you survive the challenges of your first day at a new job? 
Will you earn your boss’ respect or will you be fired on the spot after a mess up?

Sometimes unexpected opportunities present themselves. Embark on a quest to the top, armed with nothing but a camera!


Features:
* Photo Gallery: You can unlock the 10 different pictures and view them at any time!
* Unique Storyline: Join Kin in his quest for success as he collects pictures of all his beautiful co-workers.
* Top-Down Perspective: Explore the vibrant and dynamic world of Foto Boy through a visually engaging top-down perspective.
* Lite Puzzles: light-hearted puzzles that add an extra layer of challenge to the game. Solve them to unlock new areas and advance in the storyline.
* Character Dialogue: Discover more as Kin interacts with a diverse cast of characters.
* Take pictures: Unleash your inner photographer!
70010000092170.intro: Are you ready to capture the beauty and climb your way to success?
70010000092170.name: Foto Boy: A New Job

70010000092673.description:
Soar through the skies and embrace the art of flight in Art of Glide 3, an enchanting open-world exploration game that invites you to experience the freedom of flying as a majestic eagle.

Explore a stunning, procedurally generated world of idyllic farmlands. Glide effortlessly through the skies, weaving between trees, tractors and barns.

Your mission: uncover 20 unique landmarks hidden across the expansive landscape. From charming rustic barns to wind-farms, every discovery reveals a new piece of the world and is one step closer to completion.

With its serene atmosphere and soothing soundtrack, Art of Glide 3 offers a relaxing yet rewarding gameplay experience perfect for players of all ages.

Are you ready to spread your wings and master the Art of Glide?
70010000092673.intro: Spread your wings and discover the beauty of a boundless world, one landmark at a time.
70010000092673.name: Art of Glide 3

70010000093044.description:
Get ready to lock, load, and double the chaos! Double Dangerous is a high-octane third-person shooter that flips the script on traditional gameplay. Wield dual guns and unleash a storm of bullets in any direction—regardless of where your character is facing. Run forward while blasting behind you, pull off wild one-arm shots, or take down enemies mid-dive in slow motion. The choice is yours, and the fun is limitless.

Features:
Innovative Shooting Mechanics: Aim and fire freely in all directions, adding strategy and flair to every firefight.

10 Unique Worlds: Explore diverse environments, each packed with vibrant visuals and dynamic challenges.

Four Difficulty Modes: From Easy to the insane “Nuts” mode, push your skills to the limit with extra missions and escalating intensity.

Medals and Unlockables: Earn medals in every mode to unlock exclusive skins and customization options.

Arcade-Inspired Style: Enjoy a blend of cartoonish charm and sleek realism, brought to life with stunning lighting and dynamic sound effects.

Whether you’re a casual player looking for a good time or a hardcore gamer chasing the ultimate challenge, Double Dangerous delivers non-stop action, endless replayability, and the satisfaction of outgunning the odds.
70010000093044.intro: Shooting freedom—aim anywhere and unleash chaos with dual guns!
70010000093044.name: Double Dangerous

70010000093306.description:
Enjoy a different and ingenious adventure in Mycelium Heaven where a fungus with a very peculiar diet will help save its home.
Craft your best strategy in this war and overcome levels where you'll discover new and complex mechanics that will test your logic.
70010000093306.intro: It's a cozy yet challenging puzzle game about a mushroom that devours zombies. You'll expand, grow and consume your way through the forest using your wit and reason.
70010000093306.name: Mycelium Heaven

70050000053519.description:
This DLC grants access to 10 songs including Touhou original "The World Is Made in an Adorable Way"


Check out the official page for details on the songs.
Official Page: https://danmaku.jp/en/
70050000053519.intro: Extra Song Pack with 10 songs that include the original "The World Is Made in an Adorable Way"
70050000053519.name: Extra Song Pack 6

70070000026747.description:
Get ready to fuel up for the ultimate off-road thrill with Buggy Off-Road Racing! Dive into this exhilarating journey as you navigate through the wild landscapes of the USA, Europe, and Asia. It's all about high-octane races where your bravery and skills are in the spotlight.

Dive into 12 off-road tracks
Take on 3 worldwide racing challenges
Unlock and upgrade 4 powerful buggies
Experience dynamic racing modes

Gear up to skid, drift, and accelerate over breathtaking turns and leaps. Are you up for making your mark and racing towards triumph? 

Jump into the driver's seat in Buggy Off-Road Racing and turn the whole world into your racing arena.

This bundle includes base game, Custom Cruisers #1 and Custom Cruisers #4 with:

-2 new skins for each Buggy
70070000026747.intro: The Ultimate Dirt Track Challenge on your Nintendo Switch™!
70070000026747.name: Buggy Off-Road Racing Super Edition

70070000026833.description:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen? 

In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task! 

You will take on the role of a breakfast bar manager and try your best to serve the hordes of hungry customers as quickly as possible.

Take orders, prepare dishes and fight for tips! 

Invest your earnings into upgrading your restaurant and become a breakfast magnate!

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #1, Expansion Pack #1 and expansion pack #4 with:

• 90 new levels to explore
• 16 new Achievements to complete
• Endless Mode

Bon appetite!
70070000026833.intro:
It's almost time for breakfast!
Go and prove that your breakfast bar deserves its fame!
70070000026833.name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon Legendary Edition

70070000026837.description:
Like going in to town for a bite to eat? Everybody does! 

But perhaps you'd like to see that from the other side? 
Not everyone can, so don't waste the opportunity!

Manage the preparation of burgers, french fries, crispy chicken and a multitude of other treats! 

Try to deliver the orders on time, but be careful not to mix them up! 

Upgrade your restaurant and beautify it and find ingredients of the best quality, so that you'll be able to create the best burger joint in town!

To work!

In BURGER CHEF TYCOON you will find:

* 60 achievements to complete
* 40 statistics to track and beat
* 60 awesome levels to complete
* Countless dishes to master and serve
* Amazing graphics, music and sound effects
* Countless upgrades, decorations to make your bar the best!

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2 and DLC#4 Endless Mode with:

• 20 new levels,
• 6 new achievements
• New Endless Mode
70070000026837.intro: Tasty burgers? We've got you covered!
70070000026837.name: Burger Chef Tycoon Value Edition

70010000058620.description:
A new hero is desperately needed in the world of fairy stones for chaos is slowly invading the peaceful and beautiful land of Middengeard. Can you uncover the source of this disturbance by collecting all the scattered fairy stones and restore peace to the land?

Dozens of unique and hungry monsters and bosses are lurking to hunt you, all with specific attributes, so pick your weapons wisely, targeting their weak points.

Make full use of tons of automatically generated equipment, including sword, helmets, armors, and shields as the same weapon will never appear twice. For weapons, there are one-handed and two-handed swords, bombs, bows and much more.

Travel over a vast field map and explore dangerous dungeons! In villages, you’ll encounter helpful people who’ll give you clues for your adventure; sell items and offer rare rewards for clearing quests.

Enter dungeons, fight hordes of villains while solving puzzles and lay your hands on precious treasures protected by vicious beasts.
70010000058620.intro:
Dive into a nostalgic retro 3D DOT RPG world!
A significant level of suspense awaits you.
70010000058620.name: Fable of Fairy Stones

70010000088790.description:
Lights, camera, action! In Destino Indomable, you're the rising star cast as the lead in a telenovela! Dive into a wild visual novel inspired by the most dramatic Latin soap operas, complete with humor, drama, romance, and more! Customize your character and play through 5 thrilling episodes where your choices impact the story, your relationships, and the show's ratings. Discover gossip, unravel mysteries, and captivate the audience with an unforgettable performance!

Features:

- A telenovela-themed visual novel that brings Latin drama to life.
- Character popularity system that changes screen time based on your choices.
- Customizable lead actress with clothes, hairstyles, and accessories.
- Five romance paths with unique storylines and mysteries.
- Multiple endings, with heroes becoming villains, and wild plot twists.
- Over 15 hours of story, packed with secrets to uncover on each playthrough!
70010000088790.intro: Step into the drama and stardom of Destino Indomable!
70010000088790.name: Destino Indomable

70010000074830.description:
The scarlet super-thief, Carmen Sandiego, is back! Don Carmen's signature red hat and play as the vigilante herself to navigate a world of espionage, utilize high-tech gadgets, and ultimately capture VILE. Rookie gumshoes and seasoned detectives are invited to put their sleuthing skills to the test, whether it's in the narrative-driven main campaign or the classic mode "The ACME Files." 

BECOME THE MASTERMIND
For the very first time in the history of the franchise, assume the role of Carmen Sandiego herself! Dive headfirst into her world of espionage, experiencing her escapades first-hand as you outwit VILE operatives.

GEAR UP
Carmen Sandiego wouldn't be the legendary thief she is without tools! Glide effortlessly through the air on her trusty glider, swing from building to building with her grappling hook, and see in the dark with her night vision and thermal imaging goggles.

TRAVEL THE GLOBE
From the bustling streets of Rio de Janeiro to the majestic landmarks of Tokyo, embark on a whirlwind tour of the world's most iconic destinations. With stunning visuals and immersive environments, every location comes to life, inviting you to explore, discover, and unravel the secrets that lie within.

SOLVE CAPERS
Sharpen your detective skills as you gather clues, decipher codes, and tackle a variety of mini-games to outsmart VILE's most elusive operatives. But beware -- time is of the essence! Stay sharp, think fast, and act decisively to crack safes, hack into systems, and master the art of lockpicking before it's too late.

CAPTURE VILE
Gather clues and compare them to Dossiers to uncover VILE operatives. Is their hair black, red, or do they have blue eyes? Use your deductive skills to narrow down suspects. But remember, a warrant is essential before making any arrests! Will you crack the case and bring VILE to justice, or will they evade capture?
70010000074830.intro: The World's Greatest Thief Is Back
70010000074830.name: Carmen Sandiego

70010000080262.description:
Enter the world of Everhood.
Discover the color of your soul and what lies beyond the river of death in a strange land. Accompany a mysterious celestial Raven who has deemed you worthy of slaying the Mind Dragon.

Features
-Master the music-based battles with over 100 songs!
-Voyage through a transcendental journey across 8-10 hours
-Enter a wild universe with mind-bending visuals
-Conquer the unconquerable
-Custom Battle Editor Support
-Make funny friends!
70010000080262.intro: AN UNCONVENTIONAL ARPG where you battle enemies through musical encounters through a strange and whimsical adventure.
70010000080262.name: Everhood 2

70010000093117.description:
As you hold the mythical Gauntlet of Power you gain the ability to mount weapons in eight directions to protect and mow down the many dangers lurking in the dungeons. Max up your weapons, mount modifiers, combine weapons to create new weapons, or create weapon-unions for even more exotic powers as you explore the weapon tree!

All wrapped up in a fast paced, randomly generated action RPG shooter with dungeon crawling and Rogue-like elements.

You are a weathered adventurer descending the Heroes of Loot Dungeons, be it Elf, Wizard, Warrior or Valkyrie, you are on a mission to sort out this dungeon and it's creepy crawly horde of monsters. Collecting loot to power up your new found Gauntlet.

Locate mysterious items that aid you on this power trip as you go deeper into the belly of the beast: Unlocking a host of weapons, uncovering secret rooms, run into Monk's handing you quests, or purchase new gadgets from the various shops in the dungeon!

An average game run is about 20-25 minutes, a full dungeon run + final boss defeat will take up about 60 minutes. Each game is different and unique, so make sure to keep trying!

Key features:

- Randomly generated dungeons, items enemies and bosses, you never play the same game twice
- 5 base weapons and 9 special combo's and union weapons - all upgradable in strength
- Unique items that enhance your powers against the horde of enemies
- Over 14 end bosses
- 6 dungeons covering 16 levels and a final boss-of-all-bosses battle
- 2 playable and 2 unlockable classes
- Unlockable Rune-power options to support you in completing the game
- Perma unlockable Forged cards
- Secret rooms, Quests, Treasure rooms, and Shops


Learn about active, passive and special items by collecting them and using them. This information is then stored in your Codex for future games. Learn about various dungeon dwelling creatures by defeating enough of them to learn their weaknesses and open up their information in your Codex.

Try different weapon-mounting configurations to unlock combo weapons, union weapons and see if you can find the perfect balance on your Gauntlet of Power!
70010000093117.intro: Mount and upgrade your weapons into special combos in this randomly generated action RPG shooter. Mow down thousands of dungeon dwelling creatures and survive as you descend deep
70010000093117.name: Heroes of Loot: Gauntlet of Power

70050000051648.description:
Celebrate 40 years of Carmen Sandiego with the Deluxe Edition, crafted for devoted fans and new sleuths alike! Greet some familiar faces in the exclusive anniversary caper and become a master of disguise with some exclusive in-game outfits. 

Carmen Sandiego Deluxe Edition includes: 

- Anniversary Caper "Where in the World"
- Cosmetic Skin - Classic outfit
- Cosmetic Skin - Motorcycle outfit
- Digital Official Soundtrack
- Digital Official Art Book
70050000051648.name: Carmen Sandiego Deluxe Edition DLC

70070000025437.description:
Celebrate 40 years of Carmen Sandiego with the Deluxe Edition, crafted for devoted fans and new sleuths alike! Greet some familiar faces in the exclusive anniversary caper and become a master of disguise with some exclusive in-game outfits. 

Carmen Sandiego Deluxe Edition includes: 

- Anniversary Caper "Where in the World"
- Cosmetic Skin - Classic outfit
- Cosmetic Skin - Motorcycle outfit
- Digital Official Soundtrack
- Digital Official Art Book
